sentences.english: So, once again, my best wishes to the College at the start of another academic year.
sentences.chinese: 因此，再一次在新学年向学院致以我最诚挚的祝愿。

sentences.english: The first school year school excellent league member, the institute debates match second.
sentences.chinese: 第一学年校优秀团员，学院辩论赛第二名。

sentences.english: He won scholarship every year because of his wonderful academic performance.
sentences.chinese: 他学习成绩很好，每学年都能拿到学校的奖学金。

sentences.english: He will do better next year and pass the exam.
sentences.chinese: 下学年他会做得更好的，会考试及格的。

sentences.english: And first-year students have priority。 W:Well, I’ve been thinking of living off campus。
sentences.chinese: 女士正在考虑下学年是住在宿舍还是住在校外的问题。

sentences.english: In total, I have 7 teachers every year.
sentences.chinese: 整体而言，我每学年有7个教师。

sentences.english: The school district cited more than 400 parents this school year.
sentences.chinese: 在这个学年里，学区传唤了400多名学生家长。

sentences.english: Click on the link below to access our Developmental Targets for this academic year.
sentences.chinese: 点击以下链接访问本学年我们的发展目标。

sentences.english: Students shall register for the new school year.
sentences.chinese: 学生应在新学年开始时注册。

sentences.english: There are two semesters in one academic year in BLCU.
sentences.chinese: 我校每学年分为两个学期。

sentences.english: She has just completed her first year at the University of Pennsylvania.
sentences.chinese: 陆景瑜刚刚度过了在宾夕法尼亚大学的第一个学年。

sentences.english: Apply for Academic Year Semester's master degree candidacy.
sentences.chinese: 拟申请为学年度第学期硕士学位候选人。

sentences.english: Ursuline College of Languages Syllabus for the Fall Semester in …
sentences.chinese: 文藻外语学院九十学年度第二学期教学纲要。

sentences.english: Jen-Teh Junior College of Medicine, Nursing and Management FirstSemester, 2009 …
sentences.chinese: 仁德医护管理专科学校九十八学年度第二学期。

sentences.english: Wenzao Ursuline College of Languages Syllabus for the Fall Semester in …
sentences.chinese: 文藻外语学院九十学年度第二学期教学纲要。

sentences.english: All students in the third grade or above must enroll in an elective course each school year.
sentences.chinese: 本校学生，自三年级开始，每学年必须选修一门选课。

definition: foundation of a University or College/school opening/the start of a new term
to enter a school or college/to go to school for the first time as a child
